basics.name: Candace Huynh
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Hey there! I'm currently an undergraduate student studying computer science at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. My specific interest regarding computer science leans more towards machine learning, data analytics and software development. I expect to graduate in the Spring of 2025, but I also have aspirations to attend graduate school shortly after for any of the topics listed previously.

highlights: Prepared guest orders in a timely manner all the while adhering to food safety standards
Baked and decorated pastry goods with attention to detail
Tend to the guest's needs during service, describe dishes with an enthusiastic tone appealing to guest
Manages different stages of dining service efficiently

volunteer.summary: Served as an upper classman mentor to incoming freshman
highlights: Guided freshman through their first year of highschool

awards.title: Na Hoaloha O Mckinley Edmund Toma Memorial Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to athletes that have shown integrity, modesty, and most importantly humanity both on and off the field.
